shortDescription: Sometimes you hear horror stories while sharing a drink with a couple of strangers in a seedy Periphery bar. This is one of them, Commander, and what I've seen and heard has been completely unexpected, even after all these years of working for IE.
longDescription: And I'm starting to worry whether we are taking orders from an employer who might be suffering from traumatic stress.

contractObjectiveList.title: Rescue the colonists
contractObjectiveList.description: Locate the colonists and secure their locations.

objectiveList.title: Ensure that the Mech Carrying the VIP Survives
Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor2
objectiveList.description: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for autocomplete of mission

objectiveList.title: Ensure Secondary Asset Recovery unit survives

dialogueContent.words: I've contacted the location but I'm not receiving any reply.
We need to check for survivors, to make sure there isn't anyone still alive out there.
Then we should get out of here as quickly as possible.
There's also some activity nearby. Expect trouble.
This was a waste, there were no survivors around.
Only these guys who talk like they're birds.
And who appear responsible for having massacred everyone in this settlement.
Hysteria, you're late again. I've already moved out since everyone was dead.
We noticed. Care to explain who is this 'bird army' we're facing?
We do not have time for this right now because they'll be back. I'm sending the location of where I am right now - get here on time!
Takodí! Takodí! Dâketo kapi!
Hold position and look for survivors.
Darius, look at these figures in the ground... they're bodies.
Tádáka dêkó. Déko tâté.
What? What did that enemy pilot say?
[GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
[GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
First site checked, it appears everyone is dead.
Képódi dûtapi. Dâki tateta. Kâpetati.
Are they singing? What is that language?
Second site checked, there seems to be no survivors here also.
Takêpi! Tãkápi! Dakdô!
Yeah, screw you too and your jabbery.
That's it, the Mech recovering our Secondary Target is scrapped. That objective is failed. Focus on getting the princess to safety.
